Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_q9ebmz9g&referenceId=1_q9ebmz9g&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: IG Group

Description: Retail analysts suggest that this year’s ‘Black Friday’ sales event could be one of the biggest the UK has ever seen. IGTV’s Jeremy Naylor explains that while it may not be a tradable event in itself, there will be angles to watch out for within the retail fraternity.  
Short Link: https://refini.tv/317LMqg
